_header: In that year snow shal be / Wet harvest ye shall see
_description: Prognostics according to the day of the week on which New Year falls — 58 lines in couplets; last eight lines cross-rhymed quatrains

CamStJohn237.First Lines:
…In þat ȝere swowe schal beeWete heruest ȝe
                    schal see…
CamStJohn237.Last Lines:
…He bryng vs to þe lyf of lyȝtWhere Euer ys Ioy
                    & plas
CamStJohn237.Editions:
Mooney,  Linne R. 
             “Practical Didactic Works in Middle English.” 
         Diss. Toronto, 1981: 338-42.
